::KitKat::

"Megatron with the Vok?" She looked down.  "How can that be? But it 
makes sence.  That may explain why the sudded attacks and such."  She 
wondered why she felt no longer in control of herself but more like 
she was obeying commands other than her own.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Phobia sensed an opportunity coming he didn't know what a Vok was, 
it 
> sounded more like a chicken sound then a race.
> 
> "Think about this, if Rowdy was changed by these Vok as you called 
> them, and Megatron is bringing him back to the Decepticons then 
> logically Megatron could be working with the Vok." he reached down 
> and took the component before KitKat had the chance to take a 
closer 
> look at it. "And if Megatron is working with the Vok then that 
could 
> explain his incompetence." Phobia gave KitKat a sly knowing 
> glance "He hasn't won because he has bigger plans worked out with 
the 
> Vok."
>
